articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage of Sunday's Premier League action, including Liverpool v Brentford.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up to four games, including Liverpool v Brentford

articles.description: Follow updates from Leicester v Arsenal, as Man Utd, Chelsea, Brighton and Aston Villa win in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Leicester v Arsenal build-up, after Man City lose & Chelsea win

articles.description: Cole Palmer scores late penalty against former side Manchester City in a thrilling Premier League draw at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Palmer hits late penalty as Chelsea draw with Man City

articles.description: Mohamed Salah scores twice as Liverpool beat Brentford at Anfield to move up to second in the Premier League.
articles.title: Liverpool up to second after Brentford win

articles.description: Late replacement Harriet Dart beats Caijsa Hennemann to give Great Britain a 3-1 victory in their Billie Jean King Cup play-off against Sweden.
articles.title: Late replacement Dart seals GB win in BJK Cup tie

articles.description: Watch highlights of India's batting as the hosts make it nine wins from nine World Cup matches with a 160-run victory over the Netherlands.
articles.title: India's batters inspire big win over Netherlands

articles.description: Manchester City suffer back-to-back defeats as a late Lee Geum-min goal seals a shock win for Brighton.
articles.title: Late Lee goal secures shock Brighton win at Man City

articles.description: Celtic restore their eight-point lead at the top of the Scottish Premiership with a dominant, six-goal hammering of an acquiescent Aberdeen.
articles.title: Leaders Celtic hit feeble Aberdeen for six

articles.description: Tomas Soucek hits a late winner as West Ham come from behind to secure an entertaining Premier League win against Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Soucek hits late winner to deny Forest in thriller

articles.description: Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul hit centuries as India make it nine straight group-stage wins with a 160-run victory over the Netherlands.
articles.title: India beat Netherlands to end perfect group stage
